mapper.select: SELECT c.uid, c.parent_uid parentUid, c2.user_uid replyToUserId, u2.nick_name replyToUserNickName, c.content, COALESCE(c.like_count, 0) likeCount, c.create_time createTime, u.uid userId, u.nick_name userNickName, u.pic_uid userPicUid FROM t_comment c INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.user_uid = u.uid LEFT JOIN t_comment c2 on c.reply_to_uid = c2.uid LEFT JOIN t_user u2 on c2.user_uid = u2.uid WHERE c.STATUS = 1 AND c.blog_uid = #{blogId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC limit 10 OFFSET #{page}
